alert.note: Alert for Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 01 at 12:36AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...AREAS OF FREEZING DRIZZLE TONIGHT... Radar and observations showed areas of freezing drizzle and snow were occurring across the Arrowhead. The Minnesota Department of Transportation reported many roads were ice covered, snow covered, or had slush on them. The freezing drizzle will continue into the overnight hours. Freezing drizzle may quickly coat roadways with a thin layer of ice that may be undetectable. Please use extreme caution... especially on bridges...overpasses and around curves. Allow plenty of stopping distance and avoid braking suddenly.

area.areaDesc: Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore
